title: Shivers
lyrics:
[intro, 2 bars each] (Am)  (F)  (C)  (G)
 
I took an arrow to the (Am)heart
I never kissed a mouth that (F)taste like yours
Strawberries and (C)somethin' more
Ooh, yeah, I want it (G)all
             
Lipstick on my gui(Am)tar
Fill up the engines, we can (F)drive real far
Go dancing under(C)neath the stars
Ooh, yeah, I want it (G)all
Ooh, you got me feeling like
 
[pre-chorus]
(Am) I wanna be that guy… I wanna kiss your eyes
(F) I wanna drink that smile… I wanna feel like I'm
(C) Like my soul's on fire
I wanna stay up all (G)day and all night
Yeah, you got me singing like
 
(Am)Ooh, I love it when you do it like that
And when you're (F)close up, you give me thе shivers
Oh baby (C)you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
And whеn they (G)say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
And we'll say (Am)ooh I love it when you do it like that
And when you're (F)close up, you give me the shivers
Oh baby (C)you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
And when they (G)say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
 
Into the (Am)car
On the back seat in the (F)moon lit dark
Wrap me up between your (C)legs and arms
Ooh, I can't get enough (G)
                          
You know you could tear me a(Am)part
Put me back together and (F)take my heart
I never thought that I could (C)love this hard
Ooh, I can't get enough (G)
Ooh, you got me feeling like
 
[pre-chorus]
(Am) I wanna be that guy… I wanna kiss your eyes
(F) I wanna drink that smile… I wanna feel like I'm
(C) Like my soul's on fire
I wanna stay up all (G)day and all night
Yeah, you got me singing like
 
[chorus]
(Am)Ooh, I love it when you do it like that
And when you're (F)close up, you give me thе shivers
Oh baby (C)you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
And whеn they (G)say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
And we'll say (Am)ooh I love it when you do it like that
And when you're (F)close up, you give me the shivers
Oh baby (C)you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
And when they (G)say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
 
[bridge]
Baby, (Am)you are… so hot… you make me shiver
With the (F)fire… you got… this thing is started
I don't (C)want it… to stop… you know you make me shiver (G) er, er
Baby, (Am)you are… so hot… you make me shiver
With the (F)fire… you got… this thing is started
I don't (C)want it… to stop… you know you make me shiver (G)
Yeah, you got me singing like
 
[stop strum]
(Am)Ooh, I love it when you do it like that
And when you're [normal strum](F)close up, you give me thе shivers
Oh baby (C)you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
And whеn they (G)say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
And we'll say (Am)ooh I love it when you do it like that
And when you're (F)close up, you give me the shivers
Oh baby (C)you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
And when they (G)say the party's over then we'll bring it right back, yeah (Am) [end]
